description: Young For Life Pure Organic Argan Oil 2 oz.Pure organic Argan oil has naturally high concentrations of vitamin E and essential fatty acids that work to moisturize and protect all types of skin, it absorbs quickly into the skin and hair and leaves no residue.Argan oil is clinically proven to improve skin hydration and reduce wrinkles in just four weeks. Many products contain small amounts of argan oil however Young for Life is 100% pure fresh argan oil, a little goes a long way. We always show the manufacture date on our bottle to verify freshness."I've been using argan oil as a nightly moisturizer on my face for a few months. My stubborn acne has practically disappeared and fine lines around my eyes and mouth are fading. I work in just a drop or two in my hair for smoother more manageable styling, I love it!""A few drops of argan oil worked wonders for my hair and skin. It faded my blemishes and acne scars. It has made my hair shinier and frizz free. I was skeptical because of the price but the results were so amazing! Buy several bottles  it's a great deal for pure, fresh Moroccan argan oil."Healthy Hair and SkinSoft, supple skin - Anti-aging properties - anti-oxidants - vitamin E - phenolic acid - omega 3 - omega 9 - Fades scars,stretch marks - Balances PH -Reduces inflammation soothing joint and muscle pain - Penetrates scalp and hair shaft, repairs damaged hair follicles - Eliminates frizzes and improves manageability - Fights dry scalp, eczema and dandruff - Protects against pollution and harmful UV rays - No residueOur supply is limited, so make sure to order now! When clicking theyellow 'Add To Chart' button up to the rightyou'll be well on your way to wave goodbye to your beauty problems!
title: Organic Argan Oil Young for Life - Certified, Pure, Natural, Virgin Moroccan Cold Pressed - For Your Hair, Skin, Face, Nails and Cuticals. Skin Problems Relief. Use Daily and Look Younger Like the Hollywood Beauties - Life-time No Questions Asked Guarantee!
